product_name: Terramar Thermalator II Long Underwear Bottoms - Kids'
long_description: The Terramar Thermolator II long underwear bottoms help keep kids warm and comfortable when they're playing outside. Soft and quick-drying polyester fabric with a brushed surface retains warmth, moves moisture away from the skin and dries quickly; antimicrobial treatment helps reduce odors. Fabric provides UPF 25 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Terramar Thermolator II long underwear bottoms feature spandex for stretch; elastic waist secures the fit.
short_description: The Terramar Thermolator II long underwear bottoms help keep kids warm and comfortable when they're playing outside.
